entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
